rule.title: Post a message to Slack on all new errors
rule.query: (isNew:true AND (severity:Error OR severity:Fatal)) OR applicationName.raw:"Uptime Monitoring"

then.body: {"text": "<https://elmah.io/errorlog/error?logid=$logId&id=$id|New $severity in $logName>", "attachments": [ { "fallback": "$detail", "color": "$severityHex", "mrkdwn_in": ["fields"], "fields": [ { "title": "Message", "value": "$message", "short": false }, { "title": "Type", "value": "$typeMarkdown", "short": false }, { "title": "Application", "value": "$applicationName", "short": false }, { "title": "URL", "value": "$methodMarkdown $url :arrow_right: $statusCodeMarkdown", "short": false }, { "value": "$detail", "short": false } ] } ] }
